events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but I need to return it because the size doesn't fit at all and I would like a full refund.
The customer's request to return a product and receive a refund has been categorized under the Refund cluster.
An agent from the Refund Department has been assigned to handle the customer's case regarding a product return and refund.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your return. I'm here to help you with the refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is 789654123. The jacket is brand new; I only tried it on once and it is still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We can process your refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate you sending the return label. I will ship the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and completed the refund process. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was processed to your satisfaction and if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund was completed successfully and the customer confirmed satisfaction, the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support.
